item.title: Firemox 0.95 has been released (old Magic-Project).
item.description: The version 0.95 of Firemox has been released. Some features added and a lot of bugs fixed.
item.author: fabdouglas@users.sourceforge.net (Fabrice Daugan)

item.title: Firemox 0.94 has been released.
item.description: The version 0.94 of Firemox has been released. Some features added and a lot of bugs fixed.
item.author: fabdouglas@users.sourceforge.net (Fabrice Daugan)

item.title: Firemox 0.93 has been released.
item.description: The version 0.93 of Firemox has been released. Some features added and a lot of bugs fixed.
item.author: fabdouglas@users.sourceforge.net (Fabrice Daugan)

item.title: Firemox 0.92 has been released.
item.description: The version 0.92 of Firemox has been released. A major fix of 0.91 version and some minor bugs fixed.
item.author: fabdouglas@users.sourceforge.net (Fabrice Daugan)

item.title: Firemox 0.91 has been released.
item.description: The version 0.91 of Firemox has been released. A revised UI (table top, alpha composite usage), drag and drop feature, and as usual a lot of fixed bugs.
item.author: fabdouglas@users.sourceforge.net (Fabrice Daugan)

item.title: Firemox 0.90 has been released.
item.description: The version 0.90 of Firemox has been released. A revised UI (target links are shown, alpha composite usage), the database feature is implemented, so you can use several art sources.
item.author: fabdouglas@users.sourceforge.net (Fabrice Daugan)
